segments.text: Going to the gym tonight , Mary ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , Sally . I want to do some sit-ups and perhaps get in a game of singsong .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds like fun . Would you mind some company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd love it . Working out is more fun with a friend .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll get my things and meet you there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . If you happen to see Jim and Bob on the way see if they would like a game of singsong .
segments.speaker: S2
